entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 31 this evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 31 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
